main event: On May 21, 1964, witnesses reported observing a large bright light hovering over Missile Site 7 at Altus AFB, Oklahoma.
interesting points: The light was the size of an aircraft and hovered below 10,000 feet., It illuminated the silo and nearby areas with enough brightness to be seen by several personnel., The object moved vertically in a northwest direction at a high speed., Observers described the object as being round and white, comparable to a basketball at arm's length., There was no sound associated with the sighting, and witnesses noted that it rose rapidly into the sky before disappearing.
sighted object: a large bright light in the sky
witness description: A3C Willie L. Davis and A1C Paavo Sumera, both members of the Military Security and Missile Squadron
